body: A bomb exploded at Moscow's Domodedovo airport, at least ten casualties reported. An avalanche of Twitter items here (RUS) and here (RUS, ENG). @ann_mint, who works at Domodedovo, was one of the first Twitter users to report on the blast; "There're victums in #domodedovo Pray for us," she wrote (ENG) a few minutes ago.

An avalanche of Twitter items here (RUS) and here (RUS, ENG). @ann_mint, who works at Domodedovo, was one of the first Twitter users to report on the blast; "There're victums in #domodedovo Pray for us," she wrote (ENG) a few minutes ago.
title: Russia: Domodedovo Airport Blast

sentence: A bomb exploded at Moscow's Domodedovo airport, at least ten casualties reported.
An avalanche of Twitter items here (RUS) and here (RUS, ENG).
@ann_mint, who works at Domodedovo, was one of the first Twitter users to report on the blast; "There're victums in #domodedovo Pray for us," she wrote (ENG) a few minutes ago.
